item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, September 23, 2024 at 9:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. US warns Israel against full-scale war with Hizbollah
2. UK non-doms size up European tax breaks in hunt for fiscal advantage
3. Reeves to rule out return to austerity after gloomy rhetoric draws criticism
4. Military briefing: Russia ‘overwhelms’ Ukrainian forces on eastern front
5. ‘Battered and weakened’: Israel deals Hizbollah its worst ever week
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, September 23, 2024 at 9:20 AM UTC
